CustomField.formula:
"(" + LEFT(RIGHT(TEXT(Departure_Date_Time_Format__c),9),5) + ") " + Right(Train_Number__c,4)
/* Old Description Train_Number__c + " from " + From__r.Name + " (" + LEFT(RIGHT(TEXT(Departure_Date_Time_Format__c),9),5) + ") " + "To " + To__r.Name + " (" + Equipment_Code__c + ")" */
CustomField.label: Train Description
